inputs.name: referenceVolume
inputs.description: Reference Volume (spacing,size,orientation,origin)

inputs.name: deffield
inputs.description: File containing the deformation field (3D vector image containing vectors with 3 components)

inputs.name: typeOfField
inputs.description: Set if the deformation field is an h-Field

inputs.name: interpolationType
inputs.description: Sampling algorithm (linear or nn (nearest neighborhoor), ws (WindowedSinc), bs (BSpline) )

inputs.name: transformsOrder
inputs.description: Select in what order the transforms are read

inputs.name: notbulk
inputs.description: The transform following the BSpline transform is not set as a bulk transform for the BSpline transform

inputs.name: space
inputs.description: Space Orientation between transform and image is different (RAS/LPS) (warning: if the transform is a Transform Node in Slicer3, do not select)

inputs.name: rotationPoint
inputs.description: Rotation Point in case of rotation around a point (otherwise useless)

inputs.name: centeredTransform
inputs.description: Set the center of the transformation to the center of the input image

inputs.name: imageCenter
inputs.description: Image to use to center the transform (used only if "Centered Transform" is selected)

inputs.name: inverseITKTransformation
inputs.description: Inverse the transformation before applying it from output image to input image

inputs.name: outputImageSpacing
inputs.description: Spacing along each dimension (0 means use input spacing)

inputs.name: outputImageSize
inputs.description: Size along each dimension (0 means use input size)

inputs.name: outputImageOrigin
inputs.description: Origin of the output Image

inputs.name: directionMatrix
inputs.description: 9 parameters of the direction matrix by rows (ijk to LPS if LPS transform, ijk to RAS if RAS transform)

inputs.name: numberOfThread
inputs.description: Number of thread used to compute the output image

inputs.name: defaultPixelValue
inputs.description: Default pixel value for samples falling outside of the input region

inputs.name: windowFunction
inputs.description:
Window Function 
h = Hamming 
c = Cosine 
w = Welch 
l = Lanczos 
b = Blackman

inputs.name: splineOrder
inputs.description: Spline Order

inputs.name: transformMatrix
inputs.description: 12 parameters of the transform matrix by rows ( --last 3 being translation-- )

inputs.name: transformType
inputs.description:
Transform algorithm
rt = Rigid Transform
a = Affine Transform

inputs.name: inputVolume
inputs.description: Input Volume to be resampled

inputs.name: outputVolume
inputs.description: Resampled Volume

description:
This module implements image and vector-image resampling through  the use of itk Transforms.It can also handle diffusion weighted MRI image resampling. "Resampling" is performed in space coordinates, not pixel/grid coordinates. It is quite important to ensure that image spacing is properly set on the images involved. The interpolator is required since the mapping from one space to the other will often require evaluation of the intensity of the image at non-grid positions. 

Warning: To resample DWMR Images, use nrrd input and output files. 

Warning: Do not use to resample Diffusion Tensor Images, tensors would  not be reoriented
name: Resample Scalar/Vector/DWI Volume
label: Resample Scalar/Vector/DWI Volume
